name: Futuristic Flying tuk tuk rickshaw simulator 3D
name_original: Futuristic Flying tuk tuk rickshaw simulator 3D
description:
Are you tired of playing simple vehicle simulation games? YES!!! Let’s add more adventure and thrill by flying Tuk Tuk Auto Rickshaw like an airplane.
Here is an opportunity for you to achieve your dream and become an expert tuk tuk pilot. Enjoy the thrilling flight inside the city high in the skies. It’s not the time where only airplanes can fly but it’s time that your own tuk tuk auto that will fly with wings. Enjoy the flight simulation experience with your own driving tuk tuk vehicle. A new category in the market of games where you end up enjoying the thrill of flying a vehicle. A free wandering adventure where no objective will stop your air tour. A futuristic concept in the simulation games to fly vehicles and acclaim yourself as a tuk tuk pilot. Drive you auto Rikshaw on the road and let it fly in the air like a flying car or flying bus or plane and collect the stars to attain maximum scores. You are going to become a futuristic driver of a flying simulator game. Nobody needs an airplane to fly now!!! Relive the old tradition and let’s fly TUK TUK!!!
Features:

-It’s absolutely FREE on ios app store!
- The flying tuk tuk adventure you've always been dreaming of!
-3D city environment with realistic graphics
- Realistic, accurate and highly responsive controls.
-Collect maximum stars to increase your score
-iOS Optimization: runs perfectly on anything from the original iPad 1 to the latest 5th Generation widescreen devices.

This is the game you never knew you wanted!
We hope you will like our Flying Tuk Tuk Rickshaw Simulator 3D and don’t forget to rate us on iTunes! Thanks
